description:
Provides a Virtual Private Gateway attachment resource, allowing for an existing
hardware VPN gateway to be attached and/or detached from a VPC.

-> **Note:** The [`aws_vpn_gateway`](vpn_gateway.html)
resource can also automatically attach the Virtual Private Gateway it creates
to an existing VPC by setting the [`vpc_id`](vpn_gateway.html#vpc_id) attribute accordingly.

tfcfnid.description: Internal identifier for tracking resource changes. Do not use.

VpnGatewayId.description: The ID of the Virtual Private Gateway.
